value:
Prince Alfonse's sword reminds me
of my own Siegfried, which I hope is
being stored safely at my castle.

The spring in Nohr is cold and dark,
so I like my kingdom to celebrate
spring as best we can.$k$pThat, if little else, always serves to
warm my people's hearts.

Even in busy times, remember what
the spring season brings back into
our lives after a long winter.$k$pEase and sleep, and simply slowing
down to enjoy life, restores us all
to peak condition.

During my kingdom's spring festival,
we hide eggs and then search for
them. It's the definition of fun.$k$pI wonder if it would be appropriate
to hide eggs in this castle?

My siblings goaded me into wearing
such a bright and outlandish outfit.
I hardly recognize my reflection.

I bring to you spring greetings,
$Nu.$k$pThese tidings come from none other
than $Nf.

I didn't expect such growth. Spring
does bring surprises.

One can only hope for more growth
by season's end.

Surely the result of fighting with
an unfamiliar weapon.

You have my thanks. This is as
welcome as a spring breeze.

I am Xander, Crown Prince of Nohr.
Is this outfit correct for the
occasion? I ought to look festive.

I have hidden an egg for you to
find, $Nu.$k$pNow, try your best to locate
the— What? You think it's in the
hand behind my back?$k$pHmm. You are correct. I should
have known that I couldn't outwit
you, Summoner.$k$pMaybe you will be impressed by
how I painted this egg. On this
side is the symbol of Nohr.$k$pBeside it is the symbol of the
Order of Heroes.$k$pThus, this egg represents our
friendship, created in the spring
and strengthened in battle.$k$pNow, you should be careful
with this egg, taking great care
never to break it.$k$pOther painted eggs may be made
to be rolled through grass in
festival games...$k$pBut not this one.
せいっ！
Take that!
うあっ！
You...
Take this!
Celebrate!
A spring in my step!
Spring is here!
Spring's over.
Ahh
I have come to spread the good cheer of the spring season.
Winter lasts long in Nohr. While our spring is over before you know it.
This isn't my normal attire. What do you think? Does it suit me?
My siblings paint eggs during the spring festival. So too, my retainers. A fine tradition!
You may have noticed that my lance is a carrot. I hope you find that suitable?
I wonder if everyone at my castle found the eggs I hid?
This kingdom enjoys such a long spring—warm and bright. May such a season come to Nohr in time.
Yes.
A fine day.
Nice weather.
Ah! Is this where we're celebrating the spring festival?
